name: Cold Trail
description:
You play as a baby Arctic fox that is separated from its mother in a blizzard in the Børgefjell national park in Norway. The fox must find its way home and survive the harsh elements, searching for food,  water and shelter along the way.  A simple wildlife adventure fraught with danger around every possible corner.

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2021.

Credits: 

  • Gabriel Garcia - Programmer
  • Vitor Brito - Programmer
  • Nicholas Balm - Level Design
  • Sebastian Porthoz Lopez - Sound Design
  • Adolfo Domingues - Animator, 3D Artist
  • Gary Roberts - 3D Artist
  • Ana Letícia Chaves Neiva - 2D and 3D artist
